bibl.title: Procopius and Roman Imperial Policy in the Arabian and Egyptian Frontier Zones.
bibl.note: Argues that Justinian policy was far from monolithic and took into account the opinion of experts such as Nonnosus.

bibl.title: Inside and Out. Interactions between Rome and the Peoples on the Arabian and Egyptian Frontiers in Late Antiquity

bibl.seg: Geoffrey Greatrex, Procopius and Roman Imperial Policy in the Arabian and Egyptian Frontier Zones.

Jitse H.F. Dijkstra & Greg Fisher (edd.), Inside and Out. Interactions between Rome and the Peoples on the Arabian and Egyptian Frontiers in Late Antiquity = Late Antique History and Religion. 8 (Leuven, 2014) pp. 249-264.
Argues that Justinian policy was far from monolithic and took into account the opinion of experts such as Nonnosus.
